item.title: $ sudo make my summer thrilling
item.description: How this year turned out horrible for all students‚Ä¶ really exciting news at the end though!!! It‚Äôs been a while since I posted or blogged about something. This year is one of the most tragic and hard-hitting for all of us, I don‚Äôt want to stretch over the current situation so let’s jump straight on to my worst experience with any semester till now. The worst thing for me, personally is the ongoing semester which is taking forever to end.

item.title: $ blog init
item.description: From now on I’ll try to document all the major experiences I’ve gained involving opensource development, research work, and exciting stuff like game-theory, python-libraries, Linux-distro-kernel(this is what I come to when I’m super bored), philosophy-morality-religion(I’m being pretentious now), and most importantly trending topics in the field of AI/ML… let’s leave right here cos I don’t have anything in my mind right now except for thinking about the ongoing situation because of the pandemic.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Education BENNETT UNIVERSITY B.Tech. in Computer Science And Engineering 2017 - 2021(expected) | Greater Noida, UP CGPA (till 5th semester) ‚Äì 7.69/10 Relevant Coursework:Data Structures, OS, DBMS, Algorithms, OOPs with JAVA, Machine learning, Big Data, Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Numerical Methods. Publications TRAINING MULTI-LAYER PERCEPTRON USING POPULATION BASED YIN-YANG-PAIR OPTIMIZATION M. Shekhar, accepted and presented in The International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Applications (ICAIA‚Äô2020), to appear in the Springer proc.
